item.title: 🟡 12:08 pm a alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 12:08 pm a alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
